# Vendored code notice

This directory vendors the `pathplan` implementation from:

- https://github.com/unstun/pathplan

It provides:

- Hybrid A* (`HybridAStarPlanner`)
- Spline-based RRT* / SS-RRT* (`RRTStarPlanner`)

If you plan to redistribute this repository, review the upstream repository for
license information and update this notice accordingly.
